io.github.products

Class ProductionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.products.ProductionRecord

  • public class ProductionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a recorded item that has been input into the system but has not yet been processed. Objects of this class are displayed in the TextArea on the production log tab.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductionRecord(int productID)
      Deprecated.  
      ProductionRecord(int productID, java.util.Date dateProduced, Product product, int count)
      Creates a new product with the given ID, a given date of entry, the product to be recorded, and the amount of ProductionRecord instances that exist.
      ProductionRecord(int productionNumber, int productID, java.lang.String serialNumber, java.util.Date dateProduced)
      Creates a new product with the given ID, a production number, a given S.N, and a given date of entry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductionRecord

        public ProductionRecord(int productID)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new product with the given ID. Sets the production number to 0, S.N. to 0, and the date produced to today's date.
        Parameters:
        productID - the ID of the item

      • ProductionRecord

        public ProductionRecord(int productID,
                        java.util.Date dateProduced,
                        Product product,
                        int count)
        Creates a new product with the given ID, a given date of entry, the product to be recorded, and the amount of ProductionRecord instances that exist. Generates the serial number by using the first three letters of the Manufacturer name, then the two letter ItemType code, then five digits that are unique.
        Parameters:
        productID - the ID of the item
        dateProduced - a date that shows when the product was entered into the system
        product - the product that is being recorded
        count - the number of instances ProductionRecord created

      • ProductionRecord

        public ProductionRecord(int productionNumber,
                        int productID,
                        java.lang.String serialNumber,
                        java.util.Date dateProduced)
        Creates a new product with the given ID, a production number, a given S.N, and a given date of entry.
        Parameters:
        productionNumber - the production number of the product
        productID - the ID of the item
        serialNumber - the serial number of the product
        dateProduced - a date that shows when the product was entered into the system
